title: Darko Vargec
text: Darko Vargec (<a href="Serbian%20Language">Serbian</a> <a href="Cyrillic">Cyrillic</a>: Дарко Варгец; born 1 August 1972) is a retired <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player that was for many years the team captain of the 1997–98 Yugoslav champions <a href="FK%20Obili%C4%87">FK Obilić</a>. Currently he is an assistant coach at <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Premier%20League">Hong Kong Premier League</a> side <a href="South%20China%20AA">South China</a>.
